TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content: The official SQUAD accounts (SQUAD, Jebediah, Bill, Bob, and Valentina) have all had their reputation [artificially inflated](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95623-Say-Hello-to-the-Light-Green-Group%21). The SQUAD account has over 100 million rep.

Well, I just came back from a debate tournament to having 57 more rep than I started the day with, so I guess my next bar will be sooner than I thought ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I have the same number of bars as Squad, Jeb, Valentina, et al so I am guessing I need infinite more rep to get to my next bar.
I need 100 more till my second light!
3 points off a second bar. So close...
last I checked I was 40 away from 4 bars.

9.

5ch
I'm 4 away from 100 rep and a second bar?
Hit my 4th light green bar very recently, prett happy with that. I've never been so engaged with a community.
30 away from 300, when did it get so high?

Just 37 away from my second lighy. Also...

WOOP 1000th post!

> 
> 30 away from 300, when did it get so high?

I'm in the exact same boat. 30 till 300. 

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
4 points away from my third bar. It feels like waiting for the semester to end.
I think I'm about 40 from another bar.

I'm getting closer 

I have given at least 2 people there third bar ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

25 away. 5 people to give me rep and I get a 4th bar. Looks like I'm gonna have to start posting Quality posts....

![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

arg! I'm at 299 D:
I too am 25 away from my next rank. But don't rep me here, I want to earn it!
55. Hmmm, I gots to make more spacecraft.

Yeah, I'm not asking for rep anymore. It was a joke last time, and like 6 people repped me that day. Not really fair. When I post here, its just to post something about my rep, I'm not asking for any. If you still wanna give me some, go for it, but I'm not begging anymore. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
